thread.title: S&T Bancorp To Webcast Third Quarter Earnings Conference Call
thread.title_full: S&T Bancorp To Webcast Third Quarter Earnings Conference Call

title: S&T Bancorp To Webcast Third Quarter Earnings Conference Call
text:
Ã— S&T Bancorp, Inc. Logo. INDIANA , Pa., Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --   (NASDAQ: STBA ), the holding company for S&T Bank with branch locations in 16 southwestern and southcentral Pennsylvania counties, and loan production offices in northeast and central Ohio , and western New York , announced today there will be a conference call detailing the company's Third quarter 2015 earnings live over the Internet at 1:00 p.m. ET on Tuesday, October 20, 2015 . Todd D. Brice , president and chief executive officer, and Mark Kochvar , senior executive vice president and chief financial officer, will conduct the conference call. The public is invited to listen. S&T Bancorp, Inc. intends to release its Third quarter earnings before the market opens on Tuesday, October 20, 2015 . PERTINENT USER INFORMATION: What: S&T Bancorp, Inc. 3rd Quarter Earnings Conference CallWhen: 1:00 p.m. ET , Tuesday, October 20, 2015 Where: S&T Bank's Investor Relations webpage http://www.stbancorp.com How: Live over the Internet. To access the webcast, go to S&T Bancorp's webpage at the address listed above and click on "Events & Presentations." Select "3rd Quarter 2015 Conference Call" and follow the instructions. Participants are asked to access the webcast approximately 5 minutes prior to the beginning of the discussion. After the live presentation, the webcast will be archived on this website for at least 90 days. A replay of the call will also be available until October 27, 2015 , by dialing 1.877.660.6853; the Conference ID # is 13621512. To Ask Questions: Prior to the webcast, please email questions to investor.relations@stbank.net . Also, participants who log into the conference call will have an opportunity to email their questions directly from the webpage beginning at 12:55 p.m. ET until the conclusion of the presentation. Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release: The S&T Bancorp, Inc. Third Quarter Earnings press release can be accessed on Tuesday, October 20, 2015 at www.stbancorp.com . Click on "Press Releases." About S&T Bancorp, Inc. S&T Bancorp, Inc. is a $6.1 billion bank holding company that is headquartered in Indiana , Pa. and trades on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol STBA. Its principal subsidiary, S&T Bank, was established in 1902 and operates in 16 counties across southwestern and southcentral Pennsylvania , with loan production offices in northeast and central Ohio , and western New York. For more information, visit www.stbancorp.com or www.stbank.com . 
SOURCE S&T Bancorp, Inc. RELATED LINKS
